name: GKPath
desc: A polygonal path that can be followed by an agent.

items.name: init(graphNodes: [GKGraphNode], radius: Float)
items.desc: Initializes a path using the positions of the specified graph nodes.

items.name: var isCyclical: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the path loops around on itself (that is, the path’s end point connects to its start point).

items.name: var numPoints: Int
items.desc: The number of vertices in the path.

items.name: func float2(at: Int) -> vector_float2
items.desc: Returns the 2D point at the specified index in the path’s list of vertices.

items.name: func float3(at: Int) -> vector_float3
items.desc: Returns the 3D point at the specified index in the path’s list of vertices.
